verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:49
verses.text: And that bringeth me forth from mine enemies: thou also hast lifted me up on high above them that rose up against me: thou hast delivered me from the violent man.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:50
verses.text: Therefore I will give thanks unto thee, O Lord, among the heathen, and I will sing praises unto thy name.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 22:51
verses.text: He is the tower of salvation for his king: and sheweth mercy to his anointed, unto David, and to his seed for evermore.
